page.title: 11LUNAN AREA, AGRICULTURE.
page.content: The farms in this area are mostly arable. The main crops are wheat and barley though recently, with encouragement from the E.E.C.,oil seed rape has been grown and the acreage is increasing. Another crop recently introduced has been protein peas; these are harvested dry and used for animal feed.Turnips are also grown for winter feed. Another staple crop is potatoes, grown for seed or ware. One farm in this area also cultivates strawberries and raspberries for use mainly by food processing and freezer factories.These latter crops provide seasonal employment during harvesting.Cattle for beef production are grazed on the rougher grass areas.Grass parks are sometimes rented out for over wintering of sheep from farms on higher ground. There is one dairy farm in this area.
